_sText:
**This map requires a Noblock script**
**Recomended rate config**
cl_cmdrate 33 (higher value will require more rate)
cl_updaterate 33 
rate 25000 (or higher)

Current version v1c (stable version)

The objective of this map is to win a race driving a boat.
The race has 2 laps, when a player wins the race the enemy team will die.
Players cannont kill enemies using any weapon.
Each team can control 8 boats, players that cannot drive boats can see the race choose background music and try to break enemy boats with grenades.

The boat is driven using WASD, at faster speed the boat will spin less, as any other vehicle break before taking a curve.
The boat has a little problem: boats deviates to one side at high speeds.
Remember that te boat is breakable, avoid any impact against walls or other boats, also avoid grenades.
-----------------------------------------------------------
Changelog:

--v1--

First release.

--v1b--

-Disabled collisions between boats, this decreases lag and glitches in race.
-Now boats are blocked in the spawnboxes this prevents boats to start moving without driver when damaged.
-One more bridge for spectator players.
-Small map optimizations.

--v1c--

-Fixed client and server crash after CS:S OrangeBox update.
